import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import contextCart from '../components/contextCart'; const Cart = () => { const { cart } = useContext(contextCart); const Url = `${process.env.REACT_APP_URL}`; useEffect(() => { console.log('URL-', Url) }, []) return (
{cart.map((item) => ( ))}

{" "} {item.description}
